value.title: Download sample datasets and reports for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Sample datasets and reports are great for learning and getting inspiration so in todays video I will share some resources you can download and use right away!  Link to resources: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/create-reports/sample-datasets#the-power-bi-samples-as-pbix-files and https://github.com/microsoft/powerbi-desktop-samples/tree/master/Sample%20Reports

value.title: Download your reports from the Power Bi service (powerbi.com) - Power BI Tips & Tricks #19
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you Microsoft's latest functionality added to the Power BI service (Powerbi.com). value.title: Get data from zip files without extracting them in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video, I will show you how to unzip files in Power BI. You will be able to import multiple zip files in Power Query and unzip them without having to extract them first. value.title: How to add ANNOTATIONS to a chart in Power BI to provide an explanation or more context!
value.excerpt: Annotations on charts are helpful for showing when key events occurred, especially when they have a noticeable impact on the data  or to give insights on the numbers in text form to help the reader understand the chart.  In todays video I will show you can you can add annotations to charts automatically

value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.
value.excerpt: There are no Insert functions ( that I know about) in the power query user interface, so if you dont know M, you probably have to create a new column to insert text in power query.  In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
